sentences.english: Every level of the Xingyiquan practice is available annually, while participants can take part into some martial arts contest.
sentences.chinese: 每年可以申報段位，可以參加一些武術比賽。

sentences.english: Belts of grade should not be worn during the bout.
sentences.chinese: 回合賽時不繫段位腰帶。

sentences.english: Please pay attention to the latest information about the coming Dan Examination in the Members' Zone.
sentences.chinese: 請留意會員區有關今期黑帶段位試資訊。

sentences.english: To establish the evaluation agency of Wushu Ranks System in Shijiazhuang colleges.
sentences.chinese: 建立石家莊普通高校武術段位制考評機構。
